abstract: The two sides argued for hours over the rules of the trial, slowed by breaks, long presentations and failed votes to subpoena witnesses and documents.
lead_paragraph: The Senate is expected to pass the resolution dictating the rules for the first phase of the trial, incorporating a few important changes that Mr. McConnell made at the last minute at the behest of some Republican senators, including Susan Collins, a moderate vote who will be crucial to both parties. Here are four of the key provisions.
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
